relation: The ViewGroup will get focus before any of its descendants.
The ViewGroup will get focus only if none of its descendants want it.
The ViewGroup will block its descendants from receiving focus.

This may also be a reference to a resource (in the form "@[package:]type:name") or theme attribute (in the form "?[package:][type:]name") containing a value of this type. Must be a boolean value, either "true" or "false". Defines whether a child is limited to draw inside of its bounds or not. This is useful with animations that scale the size of the children to more than 100% for instance. In such a case, this property should be set to false to allow the children to draw outside of their bounds.
